headline: Ameriprise Financial (AMP) Is Up 6.2% After Q4 Beat And Record Client Assets - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: Ameriprise Financial reported fourth-quarter 2025 results that topped analyst expectations, with revenue of US$5,047 million, net income of US$1,008 million and diluted EPS of US$10.47, alongside a declared quarterly dividend of US$1.60 per share payable on February 27, 2026. Management highlighted record client and managed assets, broad-based segment strength, and increased capital returns, underscoring how organic asset gathering and productivity gains are helping offset recent advisor...
